atlantis_talk_07_botan_01:
Th-there was definitely something off about the
professor just now, right?[VAR 0114(0008)]
atlantis_talk_07_rival_01:
Maybe it was just a little dramatic flair to get us
all jazzed for more adventuring![VAR 0114(0004)]
atlantis_talk_07_botan_03: You need to go see a doctor! That’s just not right.[VAR 0114(0008)]
atlantis_talk_07_friend_01: Say, I’m pretty sure that call was really—[VAR 0114(0006)]
atlantis_talk_07_friend_03:
No matter how things turn out, I’m countin’ on
you to see this through, [VAR TRNAME(0000)].[VAR 0114(0006)]
